metadata.title: CVE-2022-48837 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:usb: gadget: rndis: prevent integer overflow in rndis_set_response()If "BufOffset" is very large the "BufOffset + 8" operation can have aninteger overflow.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
